Nahetu-naārammaṇa
Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka
Kusalattika, Sahetukaduka
Ahetukapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccanīya
Nahetu-naārammaṇa
947Abyākataṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
948Akusalaṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
949Abyākataṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
950Akusalaṃ ahetukañca abyākataṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
7.
951Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  novigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
952Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
953Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
954(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
